channel.title: InExile, Brand New 24 - 7 NEW COMMUNITY
channel.description:
InExile is a brand new server. Credits to King Fox. We will be running on for the next 3 months gauranteed (purchased). We hope to build a very large community of skillers, pkers, gamers, and male/female friends!!!
Very cool features like prestige, rewards, pk, train, skilling, bosses, and a very big shop to custamize the game your way. Rare items, balanced economy, medium difficulty on leveling (fast, but not directly easy). You will love your account!! :)
You can play on easy/med/hard difficulty, and you get a nice starter pack. Higher difficulty = better drops
Since it is new, we will be having rewards handed out to new players. So get in time for some phats and extra crafty items ;)
We will also be looking for staff. We purchased a large VPS, so this server will be on for a while. We hope to build a big community and make friends that can play together and enjoy the live action!!!
Boys/Girls welcome !!
Client:
http://www.filedropper.com/inexileclient
Hit "Download This File"
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2wgzus8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2v1rpr9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/jkizk8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/15qxdld.png[/img]

item.title: InExile, Brand New 24 - 7 NEW COMMUNITY
item.dc:creator: @labeeb labeeb
item.description:
@labeeb wrote:

I purchased it for 3 months. If we build a nice community, I will definitely keep it going! I work so money is not the issue

Read full topic
